text: Natalia Juárez Zenteno (born February 13, 1995, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico), is a Mexican actress known for her character "Simoneta" in the child soap opera ¡Vivan los niños!. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Year ! Title !
